name: Uncharted Island
description:
The sea is fraught with many secrets and mysteries that attracts fools and daredevils to go on a dangerous adventure. By the will of fate, our hero, a young warrior who was not looking for adventure, found himself in the very epicenter of a history. Returning to his homeland, the ship was caught in a terrible storm and was destroyed by a crushing blow on the rocks next to the unknown island. Having safely got to the shore, the hero sets off on a journey in search of help and truth.

To return home, you will have to get to another part of the island and destroy the device causing this storm.

Control

Arrow keys - Move

Z - Sword

X - Shield

R - Restart

Esc - Exit

Space - Start
